sn12.46:4.2: Atha kho aññataro brāhmaṇo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn12.46:4.4: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
sn12.46:4.5: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn12.46:5.1: “Kiṃ nu kho, bho gotama, so karoti so paṭisaṃvedayatī”ti?
sn12.46:5.2: “‘So karoti so paṭisaṃvedayatī’ti kho, brāhmaṇa, ayameko anto”.
sn12.46:6.1: “Kiṃ pana, bho gotama, añño karoti, añño paṭisaṃvedayatī”ti?
sn12.46:6.2: “‘Añño karoti, añño paṭisaṃvedayatī’ti kho, brāhmaṇa, ayaṃ dutiyo anto.
sn12.46:6.3: Ete te, brāhmaṇa, ubho ante anupagamma majjhena tathāgato dhammaṃ deseti:
sn12.46:7.1: Evaṃ vutte, so brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn12.46:7.2: “abhikkantaṃ, bho gotama, abhikkantaṃ, bho gotama … pe …
sn12.46:7.3: upāsakaṃ maṃ bhavaṃ gotamo dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṃ saraṇaṃ gatan”ti.
